name: Osama Bin Laden
description: Most well known for his role in masterminding the September 11 Attacks, which resulted in the deaths of nearly 3000 civilians. He subsequently became the subject of a decade-long international manhunt. From 2001 to 2011, Osama Bin Laden was a major target of the United States, as the FBI offered a $25m bounty in their search for him. On May 2, 2011, Bin Laden was shot and killed.
